pages.text: $(#630000)While my creations seem perfectly willing to follow me around, they can sometimes get lost.$(br2)This trinket should be able to fix that issue.

$(#630000)By showing this item to a parasite I have created, they will begin to follow me relentlessly, even teleporting across vast distances (but not dimensions) if need be. Who new an Ender Pearl could be so useful!$(br)Using it while sneaking will call upon these parasites forcefully.
